dcterms:creator: John R. Hershey
Zhuo Chen
Jonathan Le Roux
Shinji Watanabe
dcterms:description: The WSJ0-2mix dataset consists of two speakers' audio mixed together, generated by mixing randomly selected English audios from different speakers extracted from the Wall Street Journal (WSJ0) dataset, mixed with random noise between -5 dB and 5 dB.
dcterms:title: WSJ0-2mix

dcterms:creator: Yi Luo
Zhuo Chen
Takuya Yoshioka
dcterms:description: The WSJ0-3mix dataset consists of three speakers' audio mixed together, generated similarly to WSJ0-2mix but with an additional speaker.
dcterms:title: WSJ0-3mix

dcterms:creator: Brian MacWhinney
Johannes Wagner
dcterms:description: The CallFriend-Spanish dataset consists of unscripted telephone conversations between native Spanish speakers, recorded for the purpose of studying spoken communication.
dcterms:title: CallFriend-Spanish

dcterms:creator: Brian MacWhinney
Johannes Wagner
dcterms:description: The CallFriend-Caribbean-Accent-Spanish dataset consists of telephone conversations in Spanish with a Caribbean accent, recorded for linguistic research.
dcterms:title: CallFriend-Caribbean-Accent-Spanish

dcterms:creator: Brian MacWhinney
Johannes Wagner
dcterms:description: The CallHome-Spanish dataset consists of telephone conversations in Spanish, recorded for linguistic research.
dcterms:title: CallHome-Spanish

dcterms:creator: Brian MacWhinney
Johannes Wagner
dcterms:description: The CallFriend-Caribbean-CallHome (CFC-All) dataset is a union of the CallFriend-Spanish, CallFriend-Caribbean-Accent-Spanish, and CallHome-Spanish datasets, aimed at studying speaker separation with a larger corpus.
dcterms:title: CallFriend-Caribbean-CallHome (CFC-All)

dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: Librispeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large dataset for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Librispeech

dcterms:creator: Jacob Kahn
Morgane Riviere
Weiyi Zheng
Evgeny Kharitonov
Qiantong Xu
Pierre-Emmanuel Mazaré
Julien Karadayi
Vitaliy Liptchinsky
Ronan Collobert
Christian Fuegen
dcterms:description: LibriVox (LV-60k) is a dataset that provides a benchmark for ASR with limited or no supervision, based on audiobooks from the LibriVox project.
dcterms:title: LibriVox (LV-60k)

dcterms:creator: Alexei Baevski
Henry Zhou
Abdelrahman Mohamed
Michael Auli
dcterms:description: Wav2Vec is a framework for self-supervised learning of speech representations, allowing for effective speech representation learning from raw audio.
dcterms:title: Wav2Vec

dcterms:creator: Hervé Bredin
Ruiqing Yin
Juan Manuel Coria
Gregory Gelly
Pavel Korshunov
Marvin Lavechin
Diego Fustes
Hadrien Titeux
Wassim Bouaziz
Marie-Philippe Gill
dcterms:description: Pyannote is a toolkit for speaker diarization, providing neural building blocks for various speech processing tasks.
dcterms:title: Pyannote
